name: Sharon Vaughn
summary: Sharon Vaughn. Actress: The Break-Up. Sharon Vaughn is known for The Break-Up (2006), Pitch Perfect (2012) and Eurovision Song Contest Rotterdam 2021 (2021). She was previously married to Vernon Vaughn.
